com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity

Class DynamicDrawerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity.DynamicSystemActivity
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity.DynamicStateActivity
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity.DynamicActivity
            • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity.DynamicDrawerActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, DynamicListener, DynamicLocale

    public abstract class DynamicDrawerActivity
extends DynamicActivity
    Base drawer activity to handle everything related to the DrawerLayout and com.google.android.material.internal.NavigationMenu.

    It also has many other useful functions to customise according to the need.

        public void setStatusBarColor(int color)
        Description copied from class: DynamicSystemActivity

      • setActionBarDrawerToggle

        protected boolean setActionBarDrawerToggle()
        Sets the action bar drawer toggle icon according to the returned value.
        Returns:
        true to show the drawer toggle icon.

      • isPersistentDrawer

        public boolean isPersistentDrawer()
        Makes the drawer persistent according to the returned value.
        Returns:
        true to make the drawer persistent by locking it in the open mode.
        See Also:
        DrawerLayout#LOCK_MODE_LOCKED_OPEN

        public void closeDrawer(int gravity)
        Close the drawer if it is not in the locked state.
        Parameters:
        gravity - The gravity of the drawer to close it.
        See Also:
